name: The Rich Inner Lives of Other People
name_original: The Rich Inner Lives of Other People
description:
Limitless depth, infinite complexity, utterly obscured.

The Rich Inner Lives of Other People

Controls

  • WASD = Move
  • Mouse = Look
  • Space = Jump
  • ESC = Quit

Epilepsy Warning: May contains flashing squares. I don't know enough about epilepsy to know if this is going to be a problem, but I also don't know enough about it to say that it won't be.
